page.title: 08A BOY'S HOME LIFE:WOKINGHAM
page.content: { My name is David.}I am eleven.I live in Nine Mile Ride,in a{bungalow.}We have lived here for five years.It has a very large garden.I own a guinea-pig and a tortoise.My{family}consists of two sisters,mum and dad. One sister is 8 and the other 9 months. Mum looks after the baby,dad is a{glass salesman and works for a company called U.B.M. at Eastleigh in Hampshire,forty-five miles away.He goes there every day in a company car. Mum drives the family car.At weekends I play games or in my camp.My oldest sister goes swimming or plays with her friend.Mum works in the house or garden or goes shopping. Dad works some Saturdays. Sometimes we go visiting people.We used to go to the Isle of Wight for{holidays.}We went to the beach, ate in restaurants and visited{castles}and{parks.}This year {we }cannot go because of the new baby.
